title: 2022 Fox 34 Factory MTB fork – Actual Weights & Complete Comparison
content:
The all-new MY22 Fox 34 mountain bike fork borrowed a lot of design cues from the bigger, heavier 36 and 38 forks, yet it uses those features to drop a lot of weight from the prior model. As the sweet spot in travel for down country, fun country, and trail bikes, the 120-140mm travel 34 […]

The post 2022 Fox 34 Factory MTB fork – Actual Weights & Complete Comparison appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
